Scheme description: One-off sales support of Rs 19,611,874 for June'25.
Description: Support is approved as one-off sales support for June'25. Mismatches in CI raised for MRPs 2599, 1399, 1998, and 749 resulted in deduction of Rs 38K for 30% promo supports (only 8% is accommodative per last year's TOT). No support provided for MRP 439 pack, leading to Rs 4K deduction. Final approved amount: Rs 19,611,874.

Scheme description: One-off sales support of Rs 3,800,000 for May'25.
Description: One-off sales support of Rs 3,800,000 approved for May'25 under SuperCoins Split. Supported amount bifurcated across vendors as specified.
